subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fill]]
# [[full]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} to [[serve]] as
#* ''c.'' '''1330 - 1400:''' [[w:Luo Guanzhong|Luo Guanzhong]], ''[[s:Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 5#22|Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 5]]''
#*: [[跟隨]][[劉玄德]]'''充'''[[馬]][[弓手]]。
#*:: ''[[w:Guan Yu|He]] '''serves as''' a cavalry officer for [[w:Liu Bei|Liu Xuande]].''
